<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_background" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp">
<!-- Header with back button --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/btnBack" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:padding="8dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" android:contentDescription="Kembali" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:text="Kembali" android:textColor="@color/gray_dark" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Content --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:background="@drawable/circle_blue_light">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/lockIcon" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_lock" android:contentDescription="Kunci" app:tint="@color/primary_blue" />
</FrameLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/titleForgot" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Lupa Kata Sandi?" android:textColor="@color/gray_dark" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/subtitleForgot" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:gravity="center" android:text="Masukkan email Anda dan kami akan mengirimkan link untuk mengganti kata sandi" android:textColor="@color/gray_medium" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/labelEmail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Email" android:textColor="@color/gray_dark" />
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardEmail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:autofillHints="emailAddress" app:cardCornerRadius="14dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardUseCompatPadding="true">
<EditText android:id="@+id/inputEmailStep1" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:autofillHints="emailAddress" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_email" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:hint="Masukkan email Anda" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" android:padding="12dp" android:textColorHint="@color/hint_color" /> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnSendCode" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Kirim Link Reset" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:backgroundTint="@color/primary_blue" app:cornerRadius="28dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
